Enhancing Lives: Children

We ensure every child has the best possible start in life by providing support, guidance, and opportunities that help them grow and reach their full potential.

Support Children

Enhancing Lives: Elderly

We provide comprehensive care and support for the elderly, ensuring their physical, emotional, and social needs are met with dignity and compassion.

Support Elderly Care

Reaching Communities: Projects

We extend our impact through community-based projects that support vulnerable children and elderly individuals, ensuring they receive care, resources, and opportunities where they live.

Explore Projects

Empowering Lives, Building Futures

Hiraya Manawari Foundation is dedicated to nurturing hope across generations — empowering children to reach their full potential by giving them the best possible start in life, and providing compassionate care for the elderly to ensure their physical, emotional, and social well-being.

Child Development

Ensuring every child receives education, care, and opportunities to reach their full potential.

Elderly Care

Providing comprehensive support to improve the physical, emotional, and social well-being of the elderly.

Community Support

Building compassionate communities that nurture both the young and the elderly through shared care and growth.

Voices of Change

What Our Community Says

“Love being part of this. For a great cause. Hiraya Manawari Foundation goes above and beyond to make a real difference in the community. Their dedication, compassion, and passion are truly inspiring. I have seen first hand the impact they have on people's lives, and I'm so grateful to be a part of it. Keep up the fantastic work.”

Hassan Milanzi
